page.title: 20HOUSING; AUTHORS' CREDITS
page.content: {To the north-west of our block a {number of new housing developments {have gone up in recent years. Most of {them take the form of small bungalows {which require very little upkeep and {maintenance, both inside and out, and {therefore are particularly suited to {older people. { { Form five at Cundall Manor {Preparatory School have been {responsible for the contents of this {Domesday block survey. They are all {aged twelve and their names are: { {Mark Ashbridge,Amy Cordle,John {Craig,Sally Dixon,Jonathan Dutton, {Darrell Frost,Christopher Harris, {Andrew Houston,Richard Kemp,Rodrigo {Meakin,Sandy Ogden,Sophie Rihardson, {Harvey Rudd,Richard Smirthwaite and {Emma Womersley. }
